Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.npc.ghost.Navigation
  • public final class Navigation
extends Object
    Navigation provides utility to navigate on Squares.
    Author:
    Jeroen Roosen

    • Method Detail

      • shortestPath

        public static List<Direction> shortestPath​(Square from,
                                           Square to,
                                           Unit traveller)
        Calculates the shortest path. This is done by BFS. This search ensures the traveller is allowed to occupy the squares on the way, or returns the shortest path to the square regardless of terrain if no traveller is specified.
        Parameters:
        from - The starting square.
        to - The destination.
        traveller - The traveller attempting to reach the destination. If traveller is set to null, this method will ignore terrain and find the shortest path whether it can actually be reached or not.
        Returns:
        The shortest path to the destination or null if no such path could be found. When the destination is the current square, an empty list is returned.

      • findNearest

        public static Unit findNearest​(Class<? extends Unit> type,
                               Square currentLocation)
        Finds the nearest unit of the given type and returns its location. This method will perform a breadth first search starting from the given square.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of unit to search for.
        currentLocation - The starting location for the search.
        Returns:
        The nearest unit of the given type, or null if no such unit could be found.

      • findUnitInBoard

        public static <T extends Unit> T findUnitInBoard​(Class<T> clazz,
                                                 Board board)
        Finds a subtype of Unit in a level. This method is very useful for finding the ghosts in the parsed map.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type, same as the type in clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the type to search for.
        board - the board to find the unit in.
        Returns:
        the first unit found of type clazz, or null.

      • findUnit

        public static <T extends Unit> T findUnit​(Class<T> type,
                                          Square square)
        Determines whether a square has an occupant of a certain type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of unit we searched for.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to search for.
        square - The square to search.
        Returns:
        A unit of type T, iff such a unit occupies this square, or null of none does.
